title: My Russian Spy
description: An erotic short story of about 7,000 words. It contains sexually explicit descriptions that are not suitable for readers under the age of 18.Three Chinese girls are being spied on by a Russian voyeur at a beach in Bali. For one of them, this is the beginning of an exciting and dangerous intrigue that will ultimately stretch her to the full. There is no beating about the bush. Unable to cool the rising international tension, she is backed into a corner and a naked confrontation leads to a truly explosive climax with far-reaching repercussions.A raunchy little thriller for fans of international spy stories, especially if you think Bond girls are too tame.
author: Vanessa Wu
